name: Copter
overview: "MAYDAY, MAYDAY", yells a strained voice on Channel 9. "Mayday, Mayday, this is Base Control, we are under attack. Calling for assistance and standing by, over". As the voice crackles and fades, you flip off the head of your joystick and switch the copter computer to Attack Mode. Travelling at hyper speed you encounter the foe. A bead of sweat races down your forehead as the might comes into view. Using skill and lightning reflexes you must rescue every man.
